products.name: Samsung Galaxy S23
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra combines sleek design with powerful performance, featuring a 6.8' AMOLED display and the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor. Its 200MP pro-grade camera, S Pen integration, and long-lasting battery make it perfect for productivity and creativity.

products.name: Television
products.description: Experience stunning visuals with this 55' 4K Smart TV, featuring vibrant HDR picture quality and built-in streaming apps for endless entertainment. Its sleek design and powerful sound deliver a cinematic experience at home.

products.name: JBL Speaker
products.description: The JBL Flip 6 delivers powerful, crystal-clear sound in a compact, waterproof design. Enjoy up to 12 hours of playtime, making it perfect for parties, outdoor adventures, or daily use.

products.name: Headphones
products.description: These wireless over-ear headphones provide immersive sound, active noise cancellation, and up to 30 hours of battery life. Lightweight and comfortable, they're ideal for work, travel, or relaxing at home.

products.name: Airpods
products.description: AirPods offer seamless connectivity, crystal-clear audio, and a compact design for ultimate convenience. With spatial audio and a long-lasting battery, they're perfect for calls, music, and podcasts.
